title: Balmain
creator_credit: Kit Guyatt and Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative
brief_description: Expresses the popular protest of residents in the inner Sydney suburb of Balmain against the industrial development of the foreshore as a major container shipping port. Discusses the historic buildings and traditional character of the area and the radical changes expected. Shows the problems of the city planning involved.
